content:
As I watch registrations come in, I'm reminded that we are not nearly as diverse a community as I wish that we were. I'm trying to reach out to more woman and people of color and invite them to participate, but I don't expect us to see any major changes in our diversity for this event.

So, I would like to add a session on this topic to the agenda. In fact, I went ahead and added it - but am looking for feedback on the text and time slot.

https://backdrop-live.backdropcms.org/session/diversity-and-inclusion
Is there anyone specific we could invite to help facilitate this discussion. Maybe someone from the Drupal community?
